name: DEPRECATED: Avoid large number of String concatenation (.NET)
associatedValueName: Number of times the '+=' operator or Concat is called
description:
All artifacts should not call more than X times the += operator or Concat Method

Limitation: This does not apply to C# code contained directly into an ASP.net page (with <% tags)
output:
This report lists all artifacts calling more than X times the '+=' operator or Concat method on String object.
It provides the following information:
 Method full name, the number of time the '+=' or Concat is called
rationale: String concatenation resolved at runtime is much slower than using StringBuilder.
remediation: Use StringBuilder and StringBuilder.Append() method instead
alternativeName: DEPRECATED: Avoid large number of String concatenation (.NET)

technicalCriteria.name: Efficiency - Memory, Network and Disk Space Management
